notesStmt.note: Staining and water damage throughout, in patches. Dirt, mud, accretions, deliberate erasures. Some dark, contracted edges. Worming. Folds. Some abraded surfaces and delamination. Ink falking in parts, with losses of text. Ink offset on verso.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
